property.name: mediadisplayblurb
property.value: A doctor examining a Pakistani boy

note.text: For safety reasons, U.S. service members should never wear uniforms off base in Pakistan. Business casual clothing is usually appropriate when off base. Men should wear a polo shirt, slacks, and appropriate closed-toed shoes.
Women should be especially aware of their attire. Clothing should be modest, with long pants or skirts and covered shoulders and necklines.
